short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the age ratings for YouTube videos as seen by YouTube Parents — the world's first YouTube-specific parental control filter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Parents came out of an issue that we had — there is tons of content on YouTube that is great for kids, but it's mixed in with a lot of content that can be harmful to young minds. We maintain a catalogue of YouTube videos along with age ratings -- this extension lets you see those age ratings directly in YouTube.
